korean: 저한테 스트레스를 주는 건 주로 일 관련된 거예요.
회사에서 업무 마감 기한이 촉박할 때가 제일 힘들어요.
특히 상사가 갑자기 급한 일을 시키면 정말 스트레스받거든요.
계획했던 일정이 다 틀어지고 야근해야 하고 그러니까요.
직장 동료들이랑 의견이 안 맞을 때나 분위기가 안 좋을 때요.
출퇴근 시간에 지하철이나 버스가 너무 붐빌 때 정말 짜증나요.
월급날 되면 카드값, 월세, 공과금 내면 남는 게 별로 없어서요.
현대 사회에서 스트레스 안 받고 살기는 정말 어려운 것 같아요.
english: What causes me stress is mainly work-related things.
It's hardest when work deadlines at the company are tight.
Especially when my boss suddenly gives me urgent work, I really get stressed.
Because my planned schedule all gets messed up and I have to work overtime.
And I also get stressed from relationships.
When opinions don't match with coworkers or when the atmosphere is bad.
Um, also traffic jams are stressful.
When the subway or bus is too crowded during commute times, it's really annoying.
Personally, money problems are also stressful.
On payday, after paying credit card bills, rent, and utility bills, there's not much left.
Health concerns also sometimes become stress.
I think it's really difficult to live without stress in modern society.
